data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Shupiyan access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shupiyan, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 180 believers in Shupiyan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 16,220 lost friends and neighbors.
Pour your Spirit out on the 16,400 citizens of Shupiyan, Jammu and Kashmir, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Shupiyan that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Saryara (Muslim traditions) people.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 16,400 people living in Shupiyan through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Shupiyan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Shupiyan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Shupiyan
location.people_groups_list: Gaddi (Muslim traditions), Galleban, Shakhsaz, Sapiada, Lonpa
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gaddi (Muslim traditions) (431,000), Galleban (1,300), Shakhsaz (2,700), Sapiada (100), Lonpa (900)
